description: A fresh and tasty plate of colour!
name: Thai Mango Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup fried onions to garnish the salad
0.5 cup thai dressing from woolies or

recipeInstructions.text: Now dress the salad with a good Thai style salad dressing from Woolies or make your own with sesame oil, fish sauce, touch of diced onion, chilli and garlic. Serve on the salad for each person a half a bbq or pan fried lime.
